vārayiṣyathaḥd janamejaya uvācad vaiśaṃpāyana uvācad rudra uvācad vaiśaṃpāyana uvācad vaiśaṃpāyana uvācad kimarthaṃ bhagavān agniḥ khāṇḍavaṃ dagdhum icchatid rakṣyamāṇaṃ mahendreṇa nānāsattvasamāyutamd na hy etat kāraṇaṃ brahmann alpaṃ saṃpratibhāti med yad dadāha susaṃkruddhaḥ khāṇḍavaṃ havyavāhanaḥd etad vistaraśo brahmañ śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥd khāṇḍavasya yathā dāhaḥ purā samabhavan muned hanta te kathayiṣyāmi purāṇam ṛṣisaṃstutamd kathām imāṃ naraśreṣṭha khāṇḍavasya vināśinīmd paurāṇaḥ śrūyate tāta rājā harihayopamaḥd śvetakir nāma vikhyāto balavikramasaṃyutaḥd yajvā dānapatir dhīmān yathā nānyo sti kaś canad īje sa ca mahāsatraiḥ kratubhiś cāptadakṣiṇaiḥd tasya nānyābhavad buddhir divase divase nṛpad satre kriyāsamārambhe dāneṣu vividheṣu cad tasyaivaṃ vartamānasya kadā cit kālaparyayed satram āhartukāmasya saṃvatsaraśataṃ kilad ṛtvijo nābhyapadyanta samāhartuṃ mahātmanaḥd sa tu rājākarod yatnaṃ mahāntaṃ sasuhṛjjanaḥd praṇipātena sāntvena dānena ca mahāyaśāḥd ṛtvijo nunayām āsa bhūyo bhūyas tv atandritaḥd te cāsya tam abhiprāyaṃ na cakrur amitaujasaḥd sa cāśramasthān rājarṣis tān uvāca ruṣānvitaḥd yady ahaṃ patito viprāḥ śuśrūṣāyāṃ na ca sthitaḥd āśu tyājyo smi yuṣmābhir brāhmaṇaiś ca jugupsitaḥd tan nārhatha kratuśraddhāṃ vyāghātayitum uttamāmd asthāne vā parityāgaṃ kartuṃ me dvijasattamāḥd prapanna eva vo viprāḥ prasādaṃ kartum arhathad sāntvadānādibhir vākyais tattvataḥ kāryavattayād prasādayitvā vakṣyāmi yan naḥ kāryaṃ dvijottamāḥd athavāhaṃ parityakto bhavadbhir dveṣakāraṇātd ṛtvijo nyān gamiṣyāmi yājanārthaṃ tapodhanāḥd etāvad uktvā vacanaṃ virarāma sa pārthivaḥd yadā na śekū rājānaṃ yājanārthaṃ paraṃtapad tatas te yājakāḥ kruddhās tam ūcur nṛpasattamamd tava karmāṇy ajasraṃ vai vartante pārthivottamad tato vayaṃ pariśrāntāḥ satataṃ karmavāhinaḥd śramād asmāt pariśrāntān sa tvaṃ nas tyaktum arhasid buddhimohaṃ samāsthāya tvarāsaṃbhāvito naghad gaccha rudrasakāśaṃ tvaṃ sa hi tvāṃ yājayiṣyatid sādhikṣepaṃ vacaḥ śrutvā saṃkruddhaḥ śvetakir nṛpaḥd kailāsaṃ parvataṃ gatvā tapa ugraṃ samāsthitaḥd ārādhayan mahādevaṃ niyataḥ saṃśitavrataḥd upavāsaparo rājā dīrghakālam atiṣṭhatad kadā cid dvādaśe kāle kadā cid api ṣoḍaśed āhāram akarod rājā mūlāni ca phalāni cad ūrdhvabāhus tv animiṣas tiṣṭhan sthāṇur ivācalaḥd ṣaṇmāsān abhavad rājā śvetakiḥ susamāhitaḥd taṃ tathā nṛpaśārdūlaṃ tapyamānaṃ mahat tapaḥd śaṃkaraḥ parayā prītyā darśayām āsa bhāratad uvāca cainaṃ bhagavān snigdhagambhīrayā girād prīto smi rājaśārdūla tapasā te paraṃtapad varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te yaṃ tvam icchasi pārthivad etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ rudrasyāmitatejasaḥd praṇipatya mahātmānaṃ rājarṣiḥ pratyabhāṣatad yadi me bhagavān prītaḥ sarvalokanamaskṛtaḥd svayaṃ māṃ devadeveśa yājayasva sureśvarad etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ rājñā tena prabhāṣitamd uvāca bhagavān prītaḥ smitapūrvam idaṃ vacaḥd nāsmākam etadviṣaye vartate yājanaṃ pratid tvayā ca sumahat taptaṃ tapo rājan varārthinād yājayiṣyāmi rājaṃs tvāṃ samayena paraṃtapad samā dvādaśa rājendra brahmacārī samāhitaḥd satataṃ tv ājyadhārābhir yadi tarpayase nalamd kāmaṃ prārthayase yaṃ tvaṃ mattaḥ prāpsyasi taṃ nṛpad evam uktas tu rudreṇa śvetakir manujādhipaḥd tathā cakāra tat sarvaṃ yathoktaṃ śūlapāṇinād pūrṇe tu dvādaśe varṣe punar āyān maheśvaramd dṛṣṭvaiva ca sa rājānaṃ śaṃkaro lokabhāvanaḥd uvāca paramaprītaḥ śvetakiṃ nṛpasattamamd toṣito haṃ nṛpaśreṣṭha tvayeha svena karmaṇād yājanaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ tu vidhidṛṣṭaṃ paraṃtapad ato haṃ tvāṃ svayaṃ nādya yājayāmi paraṃtapad mamāṃśas tu kṣititale mahābhāgo dvijottamaḥd durvāsā iti vikhyātaḥ sa hi tvāṃ yājayiṣyatid manniyogān mahātejāḥ saṃbhārāḥ saṃbhriyantu ted etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ rudreṇa samudāhṛtamd svapuraṃ punar āgamya saṃbhārān punar ārjayatd tataḥ saṃbhṛtasaṃbhāro bhūyo rudram upāgamatd saṃbhṛtā mama saṃbhārāḥ sarvopakaraṇāni cad tvatprasādān mahādeva śvo me dīkṣā bhaved itid etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya rājño mahātmanaḥd durvāsasaṃ samāhūya rudro vacanam abravītd eṣa rājā mahābhāgaḥ śvetakir dvijasattamad enaṃ yājaya viprendra manniyogena bhūmipamd bāḍham ity eva vacanaṃ rudram ṛṣir uvāca had tataḥ satraṃ samabhavat tasya rājño mahātmanaḥd yathāvidhi yathākālaṃ yathoktaṃ bahudakṣiṇamd tasmin parisamāpte tu rājñaḥ satre mahātmanaḥd durvāsasābhyanujñātā vipratasthuḥ sma yājakāḥd ye tatra dīkṣitāḥ sarve sadasyāś ca mahaujasaḥd so pi rājā mahābhāgaḥ svapuraṃ prāviśat tadād tato bhagavato vahner vikāraḥ samajāyatad tejasā viprahīṇaś ca glāniś cainaṃ samāviśatd sa lakṣayitvā cātmānaṃ tejohīnaṃ hutāśanaḥd jagāma sadanaṃ puṇyaṃ brahmaṇo lokapūjitamd tatra brāhmaṇam āsīnam idaṃ vacanam abravītd tejasā viprahīṇo smi balena ca jagatpated iccheyaṃ tvatprasādena svātmanaḥ prakṛtiṃ sthirāmd etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ bhagavān sarvalokakṛtd havyavāham idaṃ vākyam uvāca prahasann ivad tvayā dvādaśa varṣāṇi vasor dhārāhutaṃ haviḥd upayuktaṃ mahābhāga tena tvāṃ glānir āviśatd tejasā viprahīṇatvāt sahasā havyavāhanad mā gamas tvaṃ vyathāṃ vahne prakṛtistho bhaviṣyasid purā devaniyogena yat tvayā bhasmasāt kṛtamd ālayaṃ devaśatrūṇāṃ sughoraṃ khāṇḍavaṃ vanamd tatra sarvāṇi sattvāni nivasanti vibhāvasod teṣāṃ tvaṃ medasā tṛptaḥ prakṛtistho bhaviṣyasid gaccha śīghraṃ pradagdhuṃ tvaṃ tato mokṣyasi kilbiṣātd etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ parameṣṭhimukhāc cyutamd uttamaṃ javam āsthāya pradudrāva hutāśanaḥd āgamya khāṇḍavaṃ dāvam uttamaṃ javam āsthitaḥd sahasā prajvalaty agniḥ kruddho vāyusamīritaḥd pradīptaṃ khāṇḍavaṃ dṛṣṭvā ye sma tatra nivāsinaḥd paramaṃ yatnam ātiṣṭhan pāvakasya praśāntayed karais tu kariṇaḥ śīghraṃ jalam ādāya satvarāḥd siṣicuḥ pāvakaṃ kruddhāḥ śataśo tha sahasraśaḥd bahuśīrṣās tathā nāgāḥ śirobhir jalavṛṣṭayaḥd mumucuḥ pāvakābhyāśe satvarāḥ krodhamūrcchitāḥd tathaivānyāni sattvāni nānāpraharaṇodyamaiḥd vilayaṃ pāvakaṃ śīghram anayan bharatottamad anena tu prakāreṇa bhūyo bhūyaś ca prajvaland saptakṛtvaḥ praśamitaḥ khāṇḍave havyavāhanaḥd sa tu nairāśyam āpannaḥ sadā glānisamanvitaḥd pitāmaham upāgacchat saṃkruddho havyavāhanaḥd tac ca sarvaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ brahmaṇe saṃnyavedayatd uvāca cainaṃ bhagavān muhūrtaṃ sa vicintya tud upāyaḥ paridṛṣṭo me yathā tvaṃ dhakṣyase nalad khāṇḍavaṃ dāvam adyaiva miṣato sya śatakratoḥd naranārāyaṇau yau tau pūrvadevau vibhāvasod saṃprāptau mānuṣaṃ lokaṃ kāryārthaṃ hi divaukasāmd arjunaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca yau tau loko bhimanyated tāv etau sahitau vahne khāṇḍavasya samīpataḥd tau tvaṃ yācasva sāhāyye dāhārthaṃ khāṇḍavasya cad tato dhakṣyasi taṃ dāvaṃ rakṣitaṃ tridaśair apid tau tu sattvāni sarvāṇi yatnato vārayiṣyataḥd devarājaṃ ca sahitau tatra me nāsti saṃśayaḥd etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ tvarito havyavāhanaḥd kṛṣṇapārthāv upāgamya yam arthaṃ tv abhyabhāṣatad taṃ te kathitavān asmi pūrvam eva nṛpottamaa evam ukte pratyuvāca bībhatsur jātavedasamb abravīn nṛpaśārdūla tatkālasadṛśaṃ vacaḥc didhakṣuṃ khāṇḍavaṃ dāvam akāmasya śatakratoḥa uttamāstrāṇi me santi divyāni ca bahūni cac yair ahaṃ śaknuyāṃ yoddhum api vajradharān bahūna dhanur me nāsti bhagavan bāhuvīryeṇa saṃmitamc kurvataḥ samare yatnaṃ vegaṃ yad viṣaheta mea śaraiś ca me rtho bahubhir akṣayaiḥ kṣipram asyataḥb upāsaṃgau ca me na staḥ pratiyoddhuṃ puraṃdaramc na hi voḍhuṃ rathaḥ śaktaḥ śarān mama yathepsitāna aśvāṃś ca divyān iccheyaṃ pāṇḍurān vātaraṃhasaḥc rathaṃ ca meghanirghoṣaṃ sūryapratimatejasama tathā kṛṣṇasya vīryeṇa nāyudhaṃ vidyate samamc yena nāgān piśācāṃś ca nihanyān mādhavo raṇea upāyaṃ karmaṇaḥ siddhau bhagavan vaktum arhasic nivārayeyaṃ yenendraṃ varṣamāṇaṃ mahāvanea pauruṣeṇa tu yat kāryaṃ tat kartārau sva pāvakac karaṇāni samarthāni bhagavan dātum arhasi vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa evam uktas tu bhagavān dhūmaketur hutāśanaḥc cintayām āsa varuṇaṃ lokapālaṃ didṛkṣayāe ādityam udake devaṃ nivasantaṃ jaleśvarama sa ca tac cintitaṃ jñātvā darśayām āsa pāvakamc tam abravīd dhūmaketuḥ pratipūjya jaleśvarame caturthaṃ lokapālānāṃ rakṣitāraṃ maheśvaramf sa khyātamātro varuṇaḥ samāyāto mahādyutiḥf athemaṃ nṛpaśārdūla vahnir vacanam abravīta somena rājñā yad dattaṃ dhanuś caiveṣudhī ca tec tat prayacchobhayaṃ śīghraṃ rathaṃ ca kapilakṣaṇamc tvam asmai savyasācinec divyair aśvaiḥ samāyuktaṃa kāryaṃ hi sumahat pārtho gāṇḍīvena kariṣyatic cakreṇa vāsudevaś ca tan madarthe pradīyatāme dadānīty eva varuṇaḥ pāvakaṃ pratyabhāṣataa tato dbhutaṃ mahāvīryaṃ yaśaḥkīrtivivardhanamc sarvaśastrair anādhṛṣyaṃ sarvaśastrapramāthi cae sarvāyudhamahāmātraṃ parasenāpradharṣaṇama ekaṃ śatasahasreṇa saṃmitaṃ rāṣṭravardhanamc citram uccāvacair varṇaiḥ śobhitaṃ ślakṣṇam avraṇama devadānavagandharvaiḥ pūjitaṃ śāśvatīḥ samāḥb tad divyaṃ dhanuṣāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ brahmaṇā nirmitaṃ purāc prādād vai dhanuratnaṃ tad akṣayyau ca maheṣudhīa rathaṃ ca divyāśvayujaṃ kapipravaraketanamc upetaṃ rājatair aśvair gāndharvair hemamālibhiḥe pāṇḍurābhrapratīkāśair manovāyusamair javea sarvopakaraṇair ajayat prabhuḥc nagameghapratīkāśaṃ jvalantam iva ca śriyād surāriyoṣitsauvarṇaśrutitāṭaṅkanāśanama āśritā taṃ rathaśreṣṭhaṃ śakrāyudhasamā śubhāc tāpanīyā surucirā dhvajayaṣṭir anuttamāa tasyāṃ tu vānaro divyaḥ siṃhaśārdūlalakṣaṇaḥb hanūmān nāma tejasvī kāmarūpī samīrajaḥb nādena ca mahāraudro bhūtakoṭisamāvṛtaḥb yaḥ purā vāyusaṃbhūto rakṣogaṇavināśanaḥc vinardann iva tatrasthaḥ saṃsthito mūrdhny aśobhataa dhvaje bhūtāni tatrāsan vividhāni mahānti cac nādena ripusainyānāṃ yeṣāṃ saṃjñā praṇaśyatia sa taṃ nānāpatākābhiḥ śobhitaṃ ratham uttamamc pradakṣiṇam upāvṛtya daivatebhyaḥ praṇamya caa saṃnaddhaḥ kavacī khaḍgī baddhagodhāṅgulitravānb viṣṇor ājñāṃ gṛhītvā tu phalgunaḥ paravīrahāc āruroha rathaṃ pārtho vimānaṃ sukṛtī yathāa tac ca divyaṃ dhanuḥśreṣṭhaṃ brahmaṇā nirmitaṃ purāc gāṇḍīvam upasaṃgṛhya babhūva mudito rjunaḥa hutāśanaṃ namaskṛtya tatas tad api vīryavānc jagrāha balam āsthāya jyayā ca yuyuje dhanuḥa maurvyāṃ tu yujyamānāyāṃ balinā pāṇḍavena hac ye śṛṇvan kūjitaṃ tatra teṣāṃ vai vyathitaṃ manaḥa labdhvā rathaṃ dhanuś caiva tathākṣayyau maheṣudhīc babhūva kalyaḥ kaunteyaḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ sāhyakarmaṇia vajranābhaṃ tataś cakraṃ dadau kṛṣṇāya pāvakaḥc āgneyam astraṃ dayitaṃ sa ca kalyo bhavat tadāa abravīt pāvakaś cainam etena madhusūdanac amānuṣān api raṇe vijeṣyasi na saṃśayaḥa anena tvaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ devānām api cāhavec rakṣaḥpiśācadaityānāṃ nāgānāṃ cādhikaḥ sadāe bhaviṣyasi na saṃdehaḥ pravarārinibarhaṇef tavaitac cakram astraṃ yan nāmataś ca sudarśanamf tac cāsminn arpaya vibho daityaghāte yathā purāf cakreṇa bhasmasāt sarvaṃ visṛṣṭena tu vīryavāna kṣiptaṃ kṣiptaṃ raṇe caitat tvayā mādhava śatruṣuc hatvāpratihataṃ saṃkhye pāṇim eṣyati te punaḥa varuṇaś ca dadau tasmai gadām aśaniniḥsvanāmc daityāntakaraṇīṃ ghorāṃ nāmnā kaumodakīṃ hareḥd tadāgner anumodāya sakhā sakhyuḥ priyaṃkaraḥd uvāca pārthaṃ vārṣṇeyaḥ prīyamāṇo dhanaṃjayamd ajitas tvam ajeyaś ca jetā tvam asi pāṇḍavad ajitaḥ phālgunety uktvā raśmīn ādāya vīryavānd jitam ity eva bībhatsuṃ pratyuvāca janārdanaḥd pradakṣiṇaṃ parikramya kareṇa ratham aspṛśatd prīyamāṇo rathe tasminn abhavat kṛṣṇasārathiḥd pāvakāya namaskṛtya vavande gāṇḍivaṃ dhanuḥd ratham āsthāya bībhatsuś cakre dhijyaṃ mahad dhanuḥd maurvī kṛṣṇasya bāhubhyāṃ visṛjad bhṛśadāruṇamd kūjantī sāpatat tūrṇaṃ siṃhīva mṛgagṛddhinīa tataḥ pāvakam abrūtāṃ prahṛṣṭau kṛṣṇapāṇḍavauc kṛtāstrau śastrasaṃpannau rathinau dhvajināv uktaḥ sa bhagavān dāśārheṇārjunena cac taijasaṃ rūpam āsthāya dāvaṃ dagdhuṃ pracakramea sarvataḥ parivāryātha saptārcir jvalanas tadāc dadāha khāṇḍavaṃ kruddho yugāntam iva darśayana parigṛhya samāviṣṭas tad vanaṃ bharatarṣabhac meghastanitanirghoṣaṃ sarvabhūtāni nirdahana dahyatas tasya vibabhau rūpaṃ dāvasya bhāratac meror iva nagendrasya kāñcanasya mahādyuteḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa tau rathābhyāṃ naravyāghrau dāvasyobhayataḥ sthitauc dikṣu sarvāsu bhūtānāṃ cakrāte kadanaṃ mahatd janamejayaḥd vaiśaṃpāyanaḥd kimarthaṃ bhagavān agniḥ khāṇḍavaṃ dagdhum icchatid etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ vada brāhmaṇasattamad śveto nāma mahārāja āsīd ikṣvākuvaṃśajaḥd yajatas tasya rājñas tu satraṃ dvādaśavārṣikamd nirantarājyadhāraughair hūyamāno vibhāvasuḥd tatra pāṇḍucchavir abhūt pāṇḍurogeṇa dhiṣṭhitaḥd nānyasya havir ādātuṃ śakto bhūd dhavyavāhanaḥd śrāntaḥ śrāntatanur nityaṃ tato brahmāṇam āgamatd gatvā pitāmahaṃ devaṃ namaskṛtvā ca pāvakaḥd vijñāpayām āsa tadā svaśarīrasya vedanāmd brahmovāca tadā jñātvā dagdhvā khāṇḍavasatrakamd arogaḥ siddhatejāś ca bhaviṣyasi na saṃśayaḥd uktamātre tadā tena brahmaṇā parameṣṭhinād khāṇḍavaṃ dagdhukāmaḥ san gatvā dagdhuṃ pracakramed vanapālais tava lokāḥ samāvṛtāḥc prajāyasva tato lokān upabhoktāsi śāśvatāna punnāmno narakāt putras trātīti pitaraṃ munec tasmād apatyasaṃtāne yatasva dvijasattama vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa tac chrutvā mandapālas tu teṣāṃ vākyaṃ divaukasāmc kva nu śīghram apatyaṃ syād bahulaṃ cety acintayata sa cintayann abhyagacchad bahulaprasavān khagānc śārṅgikāṃ śārṅgako bhūtvā jaritāṃ samupeyivāna tasyāṃ putrān ajanayac caturo brahmavādinaḥc tān apāsya sa tatraiva jagāma lapitāṃ pratie bālān sutān aṇḍagatān mātrā saha munir vanea tasmin gate mahābhāge lapitāṃ prati bhāratac apatyasnehasaṃvignā jaritā bahv acintayata tena tyaktān asaṃtyājyān ṛṣīn aṇḍagatān vanec nājahat putrakān ārtā jaritā khāṇḍave nṛpae babhāra caitān saṃjātān svavṛttyā snehaviklavāa tato gniṃ khāṇḍavaṃ dagdhum āyāntaṃ dṛṣṭavān ṛṣiḥc mandapālaś caraṃs tasmin vane lapitayā sahaa taṃ saṃkalpaṃ viditvāsya jñātvā putrāṃś ca bālakānb maharṣir mandapālo sau vadhāt stotuṃ pracakramec so bhituṣṭāva viprarṣir brāhmaṇo jātavedasame putrān paridadad bhīto lokapālaṃ mahaujasam mandapāla uvācaa tvam agne sarvadevānāṃ mukhaṃ tvam asi havyavāṭc tvam antaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ gūḍhaś carasi pāvakaa tvām ekam āhuḥ kavayas tvām āhus trividhaṃ punaḥc tvām aṣṭadhā kalpayitvā yajñavāham akalpayana tvayā sṛṣṭam idaṃ viśvaṃ vadanti paramarṣayaḥc tvad ṛte hi jagat kṛtsnaṃ sadyo na syād dhutāśanaa tubhyaṃ kṛtvā namo viprāḥ svakarmavijitāṃ gatimc gacchanti saha patnībhiḥ sutair api ca śāśvatīma tvām agne jaladān āhuḥ khe viṣaktān savidyutaḥc dahanti sarvabhūtāni tvatto niṣkramya hāyanāḥa jātavedas tavaiveyaṃ viśvasṛṣṭir mahādyutec tavaiva karma vihitaṃ bhūtaṃ sarvaṃ carācarama tvayāpo vihitāḥ pūrvaṃ tvayi sarvam idaṃ jagatc tvayi havyaṃ ca kavyaṃ ca yathāvat saṃpratiṣṭhitama agne tvam eva jvalanas tvaṃ dhātā tvaṃ bṛhaspatiḥc tvam aśvinau yamau mitraḥ somas tvam asi cānilaḥd brahmā bhavān samuttasthau sthitihetur janārdanaḥd pralaye caiva kālāgnī rudrarūpī vibhāvasuḥd jarāyuṇāvṛtaṃ garbhaṃ pāsi deva jagatpated tvam ātmā jagataḥ stutyo devadeva namo stu ted mama putrāṃś ca pautrāṃś ca patnīṃ rakṣa hutāśanad gṛhaṃ kṣetraṃ paśūn rakṣa rakṣa māṃ sarva sarvadā vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa evaṃ stutas tatas tena mandapālena pāvakaḥc tutoṣa tasya nṛpate muner amitatejasaḥe uvāca cainaṃ prītātmā kim iṣṭaṃ karavāṇi tea tam abravīn mandapālaḥ prāñjalir havyavāhanamc pradahan khāṇḍavaṃ dāvaṃ mama putrān visarjayad bhāryāṃ rakṣa gṛhaṃ rakṣa paśuṃ me rakṣa sarvadād patantu hetayaḥ sarve svanyad asmat tavābhibhod sarvatra sarvadāsmākaṃ śivo bhava hutāśanaa tatheti tat pratiśrutya bhagavān havyavāhanaḥc khāṇḍave tena kālena prajajvāla didhakṣayā vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa tataḥ prajvalite śukre śārṅgakās te suduḥkhitāḥc vyathitāḥ paramodvignā nādhijagmuḥ parāyaṇama niśāmya putrakān bālān mātā teṣāṃ tapasvinīc jaritā duḥkhasaṃtaptā vilalāpa nareśvaraa ayam agnir dahan kakṣam ita āyāti bhīṣaṇaḥc jagat saṃdīpayan bhīmo mama duḥkhavivardhanaḥa ime ca māṃ karṣayanti śiśavo mandacetasaḥc abarhāś caraṇair hīnāḥ pūrveṣāṃ naḥ parāyaṇame trāsayaṃś cāyam āyāti lelihāno mahīruhāna aśaktimattvāc ca sutā na śaktāḥ saraṇe mamac ādāya ca na śaktāsmi putrān saritum anyataḥa na ca tyaktum ahaṃ śaktā hṛdayaṃ dūyatīva meb kathaṃ pradīptāj jvalanād vimucyeran sutā mamab mandabhāgyā saputrāhaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmi śocatīc kaṃ nu jahyām ahaṃ putraṃ kam ādāya vrajāmy ahama kiṃ nu me syāt kṛtaṃ kṛtvā manyadhvaṃ putrakāḥ kathamc cintayānā vimokṣaṃ vo nādhigacchāmi kiṃ canae chādayitvā ca vo gātraiḥ kariṣye maraṇaṃ sahaa jaritārau kulaṃ hīdaṃ jyeṣṭhatvena pratiṣṭhitamc sārisṛkvaḥ prajāyeta pitṝṇāṃ kulavardhanaḥa stambamitras tapaḥ kuryād droṇo vihvalāa nāpaśyat svadhiyā mokṣaṃ svasutānāṃ tadānalātc evaṃ bruvantīṃ śārṅgās te pratyūcur atha mātarama sneham utsṛjya mātas tvaṃ pata yatra na havyavāṭc asmāsu hi vinaṣṭeṣu bhavitāraḥ sutās tavae tvayi mātar vinaṣṭāyāṃ na naḥ syāt kulasaṃtatiḥa anvavekṣyaitad ubhayaṃ kṣamaṃ syād yat kulasya naḥc tad vai kartuṃ paraḥ kālo mātar eṣa bhavet tavaa mā vai kulavināśāya snehaṃ kārṣīḥ suteṣu naḥc na hīdaṃ karma moghaṃ syāl lokakāmasya naḥ pituḥ jaritovācaa idam ākhor bilaṃ bhūmau vṛkṣasyāsya samīpataḥc tad āviśadhvaṃ tvaritā vahner atra na vo bhayama tato haṃ pāṃsunā chidram apidhāsyāmi putrakāḥc evaṃ pratikṛtaṃ manye jvalataḥ kṛṣṇavartmanaḥa tata eṣyāmy atīte gnau vihartuṃ pāṃsusaṃcayamc rocatām eṣa vopāyo vimokṣāya hutāśanāt śārṅgakā ūcuḥa abarhān māṃsabhūtān naḥ kravyādākhur vināśayetc paśyamānā bhayam idaṃ na śakṣyāmo niṣevituma katham agnir na no dahyāt katham ākhur na bhakṣayetc kathaṃ na syāt pitā moghaḥ kathaṃ mātā dhriyeta naḥa bila ākhor vināśaḥ syād agner ākāśacāriṇāmc anvavekṣyaitad ubhayaṃ śreyān dāho na bhakṣaṇama garhitaṃ maraṇaṃ naḥ syād ākhunā khādatā bilec śiṣṭād iṣṭaḥ parityāgaḥ śarīrasya hutāśanātd agnidāhe tu niyataṃ brahmaloke dhruvā gatiḥ jaritovācaa asmād bilān niṣpatitaṃ śyena ākhuṃ jahāra tamc kṣudraṃ gṛhītvā pādābhyāṃ bhayaṃ na bhavitā tataḥ śārṅgakā ūcuḥa na hṛtaṃ taṃ vayaṃ vidmaḥ śyenenākhuṃ kathaṃ canac anye pi bhavitāro tra tebhyo pi bhayam eva naḥa saṃśayo hy agnir āgacched dṛṣṭaṃ vāyor nivartanamc mṛtyur no bilavāsibhyo bhaven mātar asaṃśayama niḥsaṃśayāt saṃśayito mṛtyur mātar viśiṣyatec cara khe tvaṃ yathānyāyaṃ putrān mūṣakaṃ bilātd namo stu te śyenarāja rakṣitā rājavat tvayāa yo no dveṣṭāram ādāya śyenarāja pradhāvasic bhava tvaṃ divam āsthāya niramitro hiraṇmayaḥa yadā sa bhakṣitas tena kṣudhitena patatriṇāc mokṣayethā bhayaṃ mahatc samākuleṣu jñāneṣu na buddhikṛtam eva tata na copakṛtam asmābhir na cāsmān vettha ye vayamc pīḍyamānā bharasy asmān kā satī ke vayaṃ tavaa taruṇī darśanīyāsi samarthā bhartur droṇenākliṣṭakarmaṇāc droṇam āha pratītātmā mandapālapratijñayāa ṛṣir droṇas tvam asi vai brahmaitad vyāhṛtaṃ tvayāc īpsitaṃ te kariṣyāmi na ca te vidyate bhayama mandapālena yūyaṃ hi mama pūrvaṃ putrāḥ samyag upāsirec sa ca tān ātmajān rājann āśvāsayitum ārabhat mandapāla uvācaa yuṣmākaṃ parirakṣārthaṃ vijñapto jvalano mayāc agninā ca tathety evaṃ pūrvam eva pratiśrutama agner vacanam ājñāya mātur dharmajñatāṃ ca vaḥc yuṣmākaṃ ca paraṃ vīryaṃ nāhaṃ pūrvam ihāgataḥa na saṃtāpo hi vaḥ kāryaḥ putrakā maraṇaṃ pratic ṛṣīn veda hutāśo pi brahma tad viditaṃ ca vaḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa evam āśvāsya putrān sa bhāryāṃ cādāya bhāratac mandapālas tato deśād anyaṃ deśaṃ jagāma haa bhagavān api tigmāṃśuḥ samiddhaṃ khāṇḍavaṃ vanamc dadāha saha kṛṣṇābhyāṃ janayañ jagato bhayama vasāmedovahāḥ kulyās tatra pītvā ca pāvakaḥc agacchat paramāṃ tṛptiṃ darśayām āsa cārjunama tato ntarikṣād bhagavān avatīrya sureśvaraḥc marudgaṇavṛtaḥ pārthaṃ mādhavaṃ cābravīd idama kṛtaṃ yuvābhyāṃ karmedam amarair api duṣkaramc varān vṛṇītaṃ tuṣṭo smi durlabhān apy amānuṣāna pārthas tu varayām āsa śakrād astrāṇi sarvaśaḥb arjuna uvācab devarāja uvācab astraṃ pāśupataṃ deva vṛṇomi vadatāṃ varab divyāny astrāṇi cānyāni dadasva harivāhanab aindrādīn gṛhyatāṃ pārtha astrāṇi vidhipūrvakamb astraṃ pāśupataṃ divyaṃ tryambakas te pradāsyatic grahītuṃ tac ca śakro sya tadā kālaṃ cakāra haa yadā prasanno bhagavān mahādevo bhaviṣyatic tubhyaṃ tadā pradāsyāmi pāṇḍavāstrāṇi sarvaśaḥa aham eva ca taṃ kālaṃ vetsyāmi kurunandanac tapasā mahatā cāpi dāsyāmi tava tāny ahama āgneyāni ca sarvāṇi vāyavyāni tathaiva cac madīyāni ca sarvāṇi grahīṣyasi dhanaṃjayaa vāsudevo pi jagrāha prītiṃ pārthena śāśvatīmc dadau ca tasmai devendras taṃ varaṃ prītimāṃs tadāa dattvā tābhyāṃ varaṃ prītaḥ saha devair marutpatiḥc hutāśanam anujñāpya jagāma tridivaṃ punaḥa pāvakaś cāpi taṃ dāvaṃ dagdhvā samṛgapakṣiṇamc ahāni pañca caikaṃ ca virarāma sutarpitaḥa jagdhvā māṃsāni pītvā ca medāṃsi rudhirāṇi cac yuktaḥ paramayā prītyā tāv uvāca viśāṃ patea yuvābhyāṃ puruṣāgryābhyāṃ tarpito smi yathāsukhamc anujānāmi vāṃ vīrau carataṃ yatra vāñchitamd gāṇḍīvaṃ ca dhanur divyam akṣayyau ca maheṣudhīd kapidhvajo rathaś cāyaṃ tava dattau mahārathad anena dhanuṣā caiva rathenānena bhāratad vijeṣyasi raṇe śatrūn sasurāsuramānuṣāna evaṃ tau samanujñātau pāvakena mahātmanāc arjuno vāsudevaś ca dānavaś ca mayas tathāa parikramya tataḥ sarve trayo pi bharatarṣabhac ramaṇīye nadīkūle sahitāḥ samupāviśand tato bravīn mayaḥ pārthaṃ vāsudevasya saṃnidhaud prāñjaliḥ ślakṣṇayā vācā pūjayitvā punaḥ punaḥd janamejaya uvācad vaiśaṃpāyana uvācad dadāha bhagavān vahniḥ kimarthaṃ khāṇḍavaṃ ca tatd kasya vā vipriyaṃ kurvan kasya vā priyakāmyayād na hy alpe kāraṇe vahnir nirbandhaṃ kartum arhatid dahanaṃ prati viprendra khāṇḍavasyeti me matiḥd śṛṇu me bhāvito rājan sarvam eva yathātathamd yannimittaṃ dadāhāgniḥ khāṇḍavaṃ pṛthivīpated babhūva rājā rājendra śvetaketur iti śrutaḥd ikṣvākūṇām atiratho yajvā vipuladakṣiṇaḥd jagrāha dīkṣāṃ sa nṛpas tadā varṣasahasrakīmd ṛtvigbhiḥ sahito dhīmān ayajaj janamejayad tasya satre tadā tasmin samāgacchan maharṣayaḥd vedavedāṅgavidvāṃso brāhmaṇāś ca sahasraśaḥd tatas tu ṛtvijas tasya dhūmavyākulalocanāḥd kālena mahatā khinnās tatyajus te narādhipamd tataḥ prasādayām āsa ṛtvijaḥ sa mahīpatiḥd cakṣur vikalatāṃ prāptā na prasīduś ca tasya ted tatas teṣām anumate vighnitas tu narādhipaḥd satraṃ samāpayām āsa ṛtvigbhir aparaiḥ sahad satreṇa mahatā cāpi yayau svargam abhiṣṭutaḥd ṛtvigbhiḥ sahitaḥ sarvaiḥ sasadasyaiḥ samanvitaḥd satre papau havyavāhaḥ sahasraṃ parivatsarānd sa tena haviṣā vahniḥ parāṃ tṛptim agacchatad na caicchad agnir ādātuṃ havir anyasya kasya citd aruciś cāviśat tasya tato gāt sa pitāmahamd sa pitāmaham āsādya etadarthaṃ nyavedayatd bhagavan paramā tṛptiḥ kṛtā vai śvetaketunād aruciś cāviśat tīvrā tāṃ na śaknomy apohitumd tam abravīt tadā vahniṃ sarvabhūtapitāmahaḥd aruciṃ nāśayiṣye te samayaṃ pratipadyased bravītu tam uvācātha brahmāṇaṃ havyavāhanaḥd abravīt taṃ tato brahmā khāṇḍavaṃ tvaṃ daher yadid tatra hy aneke ripavaḥ surāṇāṃ nivasanty utad matprasādād ruciḥ samyak tava vahne bhaviṣyatid kālaṃ ca kaṃ cit kṣamatāṃ tatas tad dhakṣyate bhavānd mānuṣye pi ca saṃbhūtau naranārāyaṇāv ṛṣīd tābhyāṃ tvaṃ sahito dāvaṃ dhakṣyase havyavāhanad evam astv iti taṃ vahnir brahmāṇaṃ pratyabhāṣatad saṃbhūtau tau viditvā tu naranārāyaṇāv ṛṣīd tadasya mahato rājaṃs tac ca vākyaṃ svayaṃbhuvaḥd anusmṛtya jagāmātha dāvaṃ dagdhuṃ ca havyavāṭd etat te kathitaṃ rājan yathaitad abhavat purād dahanād yatra mukto sau mayo nāgo tha śārṅgakāḥ
